mapper.select: SELECT EXHIBITION_NO, TITLE, PLACE, MAIN_IMG, EX_DATE, CODENAME, IS_FREE FROM EXHIBITION WHERE CODENAME = '전시/미술' AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= CURRENT_DATE

SELECT EXHIBITION_NO, TITLE, PLACE, MAIN_IMG, EX_DATE, CODENAME, IS_FREE FROM EXHIBITION WHERE CODENAME = '전시/미술' AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASC

SELECT A.EXHIBITION_NO, A.TITLE, A.PLACE, A.MAIN_IMG, A.EX_DATE, A.CODENAME, A.IS_FREE FROM EXHIBITION A JOIN TICKETING B ON (A.EXHIBITION_NO = B.EXHIBITION_NO) JOIN REVIEW C ON (B.TICKET_NO = C.TICKET_NO) WHERE CODENAME = '전시/미술' AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EX_DATE, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY A.EXHIBITION_NO, A.TITLE, A.PLACE, A.MAIN_IMG, A.EX_DATE, A.CODENAME, A.IS_FREE ORDER BY COUNT(C.TICKET_NO) DESC
